morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happened‚ probably in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something done to one
morphInfos.caseExplained: something is being done for them or relating to them
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are neuter or take a neuter form
